title: HDFC Bank beats peer banks in garnering deposits with a wide margin
description: In its efforts to enhance the credit to deposit mix, the Reserve Bank of India sparked intense competition among banks for deposits. HDFC Bank excelled, achieving substantial deposit growth despite having fewer branches than State Bank of India. Public sector banks lagged, even with extensive branch networks.
